posts.post_content:
Sometimes you forget what you have and buy the same thing twice (or three times)!  In each case, I only need one of the subject/back combos, and I don't care which one I keep.

I have three Burke EPDG (one raw with a lower left corner crease; one PSA 4)
[STRIKE]I have two Davidson C350 (one an SGC 20 and the other an SGC30).[/STRIKE]

For trades, looking for any Sweet Cap 460s I don't have and any Indianapolis Master I don't have.  Or make a cash offer.

I also have an extra Carr... Sovereign 350 raw
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/indianapolis-master/19097/carr-charley[/IMG]
